sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT SourceId FROM CTL.vw_ControlConfiguration WHERE TaskName = ''', pipeline().parameters.SourceName, ''' AND ControlStageID = 1')

sqlReaderQuery.value:
UPDATE U
SET [EndedDTS] = CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(DATETIMEOFFSET, GETDATE()) AT TIME ZONE 'AUS Eastern Standard Time')
FROM [dbo].[ExtractLoadStatus] U
WHERE BatchID = '@{variables('ParentBatchID')}'
AND SystemCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.SystemCode}'
SELECT 1 A

ErrorMessage.value: Check Task Execution Log for errors

sqlReaderQuery.value:
DECLARE @SystemCodes VARCHAR(50) = '@{pipeline().parameters.SystemCodes}';
WITH [_SystemCodes] AS (
	SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(value) [SystemCode] FROM STRING_SPLIT(IIF(LEN(TRIM(@SystemCodes))=0, NULL, @SystemCodes), ',')
)
SELECT 
DISTINCT
LEFT([SourceID], 2) [Order], M.[SystemCode]
FROM [dbo].[ExtractLoadManifest] M
JOIN [_SystemCodes] C ON C.[SystemCode] = M.[SystemCode] 
WHERE [Enabled] = 1 
UNION 
SELECT 
DISTINCT
LEFT([SourceID], 2) [Order], M.[SystemCode]
FROM [dbo].[ExtractLoadManifest] M
WHERE [Enabled] = 1 AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [_SystemCodes]) = 0
ORDER BY 1

properties.description: Triggers Main pipeline to kick off Hydra daily loads on the blob-creation event of 'trigger_batch_daily_hydra.json' in 'triggers' container. This pipeline invocation runs multiple HYDRA data load Projects.

Triggers Main pipeline to kick off SAP CRM daily loads on the blob-creation event of 'trigger_batch_daily_sapcrm.json' in 'triggers' container. This pipeline invocation runs multiple SAPCRM data load Projects.

Triggers Main pipeline to kick off SAP ISU daily loads on the blob-creation event of 'trigger_batch_daily_sapisu.json' in 'triggers' container. This pipeline invocation runs multiple SAPISU data load Projects.
